title: 5 Less Known CMD Tips & Tricks
description:
Here are 5 lesser-known cmd tips tricks.


[0:43] How to open CMD

You can press Win+R to open run box and then type cmd and hit enter. Or use shift + right click.

[3:07] Schedule a Shutdown 

shutdown -s -t 3600 (will shutdown the computer in 1 hour)

[4:28]  Find out history of commands

Use UP/Down arrow key, doskey /history or press f7 key 

[5:44] 
awesome cmd tricks

Type in the command wmic and then type exit. 

[6:30] How to copy stuff on CMD

Turn on quick edit from properties, use ipconfig | clip
